cycles.note: Cycle 1 used hardcoded extraction rules, not LLM reasoning. Results were template-generated. Retained for baseline comparison only.

cycles.master_synthesis: Cycle 3 reveals a US economy in structural bifurcation. Sectors exposed to AI cost disruption (professional services -0.4%, transportation -0.9%) are entering the liquidation cascade while labor-absorbing sectors (healthcare +2.6%) face permanent shortages amplified by immigration policy. The critical insight is that these are not separate stories — they are two sides of the same structural shift, and the opportunity corridor sits at their intersection. Bond markets (HY spread 2.87%) have not priced this divergence, meaning the distress window is open but not yet crowded. The 1000x inference cost reduction confirms P1 infrastructure overhang, making H1 entry timing optimal for agentic-first businesses that consume cheap compute rather than build it.

cross_principle_patterns.evidence: Prof services -97K jobs while healthcare +709K. Same economy, opposite directions.
C&I loans down $55.8B while delinquency stable. Incumbents denied restructuring capital.
1000x inference cost reduction makes $37/hr human labor look like 37-370x overpay for many tasks.
HY spread 2.87% (tight) while Ch.11 +76% YoY. Market mispricing = timing window.

emergent_principles.name: Timing Arbitrage (potential P7)
emergent_principles.description: Companies cutting human capacity before AI can replace it, creating service vacuums.

top_opportunities.name: Distressed Professional Services Acquisition + Agentic Rebuild
Healthcare Staffing Gap — AI-Augmented Nurse Capacity Multiplier

next_cycle_direction: Deep-dive Agent B verification on top 2 opportunities (Distressed Prof Services, Healthcare Staffing)
Run competitor scans on both via Agent A
Increase weight on data_specificity (1.3) — need real acquisition prices, real client book sizes
Decrease weight on novelty (0.7) — we have the themes, now need unit economics depth
Add LATAM scanning pass: are the same cascades happening in Argentina/Brazil?
Investigate the P7 Timing Arbitrage hypothesis: which industries cut humans prematurely?
